comment: Not sure how Dr. Emerson is with actual nursing courses, but she was great teaching global health. We only had group discussions in each class, two papers, and two presentations. She is also very nice and approachable for issues and questions.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Holistic nursing was a difficult class mostly taught with powerpoints, which I didn't like. However, professor Emerson made everything seem so simple, which boosted my confidence. I really wish that she taught every class and that I could just follow her around for clinicals.
